Package com.adobe.web.server

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Handler
    This class listens to the request and forward the client request to WebClient
    HTTPWebServer
    This class is the main class for starting the server
    ThreadPoolProvider
    this class will create a poll of thread to handle the requests
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    MalformedRequestException
    This class is used for denoting malformed request exception
